io.micronaut.http

Interface MutableHttpHeaders

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConvertibleMultiValues<java.lang.String>, ConvertibleValues<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>, Headers, HttpHeaders, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>>, MutableHeaders, ValueResolver<java.lang.CharSequence>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyHttpHeaders, SimpleHttpHeaders

    public interface MutableHttpHeaders
extends MutableHeaders, HttpHeaders
    Extends HttpHeaders add methods for mutation of headers.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

        Adds the date header for the given LocalDateTime.
